section.title: Description
section.p: Indicates the eligibility of the Patient to receive a vaccine under a publicly funded vaccine program. See MIROW “IIS collaboration with VFC Program and Grantee Immunization Programs” guidelines.

stentry.p: See Financial Class (PHVS_IIS) definition for values.
Categorizes the eligibility of the patient to receive a vaccine under a publicly funded vaccine program.
The date upon which the Patient's financialClass was determined.
